title: New Zealand South Island Eco-Glamping Luxury with Daily Breakfast Hamper, Welcome Cheese & Wine
description:
Trade city lights for majestic landscapes, salt-licked beaches, native wildlife and gourmet wineries at this boutique, eco-conscious retreat in picture-perfect Golden Bay. Embrace the outdoors without forgoing life's little luxuries in your sophisticated glamping tent, complete with plush bedding, a crackling wood fire, vintage bathtubs and sweeping views.

Your Golden Bay adventure extends far beyond the confines of Drift Off Grid - venture out to explore the nearby hiking trails of Abel Tasman National Park, frollic along the pristine coastline of Tata Beach or partake in a rejuvenating yoga session amidst the serene surroundings.
offer_address: 1322 Abel Tasman Drive, Tata Beach, Golden Bay 7183, New Zealand
